ADVENT.Definition: the arrival of a notable person or thing

AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL.Definition: the people and equipment that control and monitor aircraft from the ground

BYPASS.Definition: to avoid by going around, above, or below

CONTEXTUALISE.Definition: put into context, give you the background to help understand

CRISES.Definition: times of intense difficulty or danger

ENCROACH ON.Definition: intrude on (a person's territory, rights, personal life, etc.)

HARD AND FAST.Definition: (of a rule or a distinction made) fixed and definitive

LEADER ON.Definition: revealing part of what is to come

NICE LITTLE EARNER.Definition: (informal) something that you can make money from easily

SLICE.Definition: a portion or share of something

SOIL.Definition: the upper layer of earth in which plants grow

STOOD THE TEST OF TIME.Definition: last or remain popular for a long time

TRESPASSING.Definition: enter someone's land or property without permission
